6570.quoteText: While we give our users many avenues to opt out of providing Personal Information, we do not respond to Web browsers’ “do not track” signals.
6570.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

6658.quoteText: We may Process the following categories of Personal Information about you:
6658.title: The service collects many different types of personal data

tosdr.case: The service collects many different types of personal data
tosdr.tldr:
This comes after that statement:

"Personal details: your name. username or login details. password. areas or topics of interest. and photograph (if you or another user posts a photo on the Service).
Demographic information: gender. age/date of birth. nationality. salutation. job title, company information, education, work experience and other professional information. and language preferences.
Contact details:postal address. telephone and/or mobile number. email address. and your public social media handles or profile(s).
Consent records: records of any consents you may have given, together with the date and time, means of consent and any related information (e.g., the subject matter of the consent).
Location information: location data that describes the precise geographic location of your device (Precise Location Data”).
Purchase and payment details:records of purchases and prices. invoice records. payment records. billing address. payment method. cardholder or account holder name. payment amount. and payment date.
Employer details: where you interact with us in your capacity as an employee, the contact information of your employer (including name, address, telephone number and email address) to the extent relevant.
Views and opinions: any views and opinions that you or other users choose to send to us, or publicly post about us on social media platforms or in the Services, including on forum. 
We also collect other kinds of information from you or other sources, which we refer to as “Other Information"

With other information being cookies, device, etc. after this quote

6659.quoteText:
Web Beacons, which are electronic files that allow a website to count users who have visited that page or to access certain cookies.
  • Pixel Tags, also known as clear GIFs, beacons, spotlight tags or web bugs, which are a method for passing information from the user’s computer to a third party website.
  • Local Shared Objects, such as Flash cookies, and Local Storage, such as HTML5.
6659.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

6666.quoteText:
third party Processors (such as analytic providers.
data centers.
etc.), located anywhere in the world
6666.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
tosdr.tldr: Full Quote: "we may disclose your User Information to: legal and regulatory authorities, upon request, or for the purposes of reporting any actual or suspected breach of applicable law or regulation; outside professional advisors (such as accountants, auditors, or lawyers), subject to binding contractual obligations of confidentiality; third party Processors (such as analytic providers. data centers. etc.), located anywhere in the world "

6737.quoteText: in the event that we sell or transfer all or any relevant portion of our business or assets (including in the event of a reorganization, dissolution or liquidation)
6737.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

9760.quoteText: User Engagement and Purchases: tracking purchase traffic and activity across the Service and on Channels, including review of your browsing history (if available).
9760.title: This service can view your browser history

tosdr.case: This service can view your browser history

9762.quoteText:
We may obtain your Personal Information when you provide it to us across our Services (e.g., where you sign up for emails, newsletters, bulletins, webinars or white papers.
register for site membership or create a profile or account on any part of the Services.
enter a sweepstakes, contest, competition or prize draw.
receive promotional information by SMS text message.
participate in surveys.
9762.title: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions

tosdr.case: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions

9882.quoteText: Third party information: We may collect or obtain your Personal Information from third parties who provide it to us.
9882.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: This service gathers information about you through third parties

9883.quoteText: You may access, correct, or request deletion of your personal information by logging into your account or contacting us through our DSAR Portal.
9883.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

10096.quoteText: (ii) use any robot, spider, site search and/or retrieval application, or other device to retrieve or index any portion of the Services.
10096.title: Spidering or crawling is not allowed

tosdr.case: Spidering or crawling is not allowed

11697.quoteText: Disclose your identity or other information about you to law enforcement officials upon request if Ookla determines in its sole discretion that such disclosure is in the interest of protecting its users or the public
11697.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
tosdr.tldr:
Full quote: "Ookla has the right, but not the obligation, to take any of the following actions in our sole discretion at any time and for any reason without giving you any prior notice: Restrict, suspend, or terminate your access to all or any part of our Services; Change, suspend, or discontinue all or any part of our Services; Refuse, move, edit or remove any Material for any reason; Refuse, move, edit or remove any Content that is available on the Services; Deactivate or delete your account(s) and all related information and files in your account(s) Disclose your identity or other information about you to any third party who claims that Material posted by you violates their legal rights, including, but not limited to, their intellectual property rights or their rights of privacy or publicity;
Disclose your identity or other information about you to law enforcement officials upon request if Ookla determines in its sole discretion that such disclosure is in the interest of protecting its users or the public"
